document_data.name: Densil Wizardfoe
document_data.mainbody: '''Densil Wizardfoe''' was an [[adventurer]] in [[Cormyr]] with the [[Magebanes]] company in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Densil had a strong distrust and disdain for [[magic item]]s and [[spell]]s, and refused to use or work alongside them.
document_data.Abilities: Lacking magical enhancement, Densil was a strong and powerful warrior on his own merits.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Densil and [[Floryn Spellshatter]] attended a party at [[Thistleflame Keep]], held by Lord [[Partic Thistle]] for King [[Azoun IV]]'s birthday. They stayed the night in the Keep and were briefly considered suspects after Lord Thistle's apparent murder, but their refusal to use any magic ruled them out.
